name: EuroPriSe GmbH
membership: Parent company: 2B Advice GmbH - the privacy benchmark: https://www.2b-advice.com/GmbH-de
goal:
EuroPriSe GmbH operates the data protection certification program "EuroPriSe - European Privacy Seal" which certifies compliance of IT products, IT-based services and websites with EU data protection law. Hereby, EuroPriSe GmbH aims to promote visibility for privacy-friendly products, services and websites, to mobilize competition in privacy and to foster user trust.

At this time, EuroPriSe's primary objective is to be accredited as a certification body pursuant to Art. 43 General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2016/679 - GDPR) and to receive the European Data Protection Board's approval for EuroPriSe's certification criteria for IT-products and IT-based services pursuant to Art. 42(5) GDPR.

Note: Where the criteria are approved by the Board, this may result in a common certification, the European Data Protection Seal.
interests: Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Regulation (EU) 2016/679 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation)

EuroPriSe GmbH has a particular interest in any activities of the European Commission towards the adoption of delegated acts for the purpose of specifying the requirements to be taken into account for the data protection certification mechanisms (Art. 43(8) GDPR) and of implementing acts laying down technical standards for certification mechanisms and mechanisms to promote and recognise those certification mechanisms (Art. 43(9) GDPR).
